column4: political and geographic subdivisions of a state.  236 other local governments and geographic places are also first-order administrative divisions of their respective state/district/territory

The 236 county equivalents include 100 equivalents in the territories (such as those in Puerto Rico) outside the 50 states and the District of Columbia. The large majority of counties and equivalents were organized by 1970.  Since that time
